name: GridIron VIC20 Unexpanded
description:
Unexpanded VIC20 conversion of my C16 game Gridiron.
Huge optimization and improved visuals with parallax scrolling effects all in 3.5K.

This has been tested in VICE and on real hardware and is PAL/NTSC compatible.

It's also available on cassette to buy from FantasySoftwareDesigns.
